Module atlantafx.base
Package atlantafx.base.controls

Class TileSkinBase<T extends TileBase>

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.control.SkinBase<T>
atlantafx.base.controls.TileSkinBase<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.scene.control.Skin<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
MessageSkin, TileSkin
public abstract class TileSkinBase<T extends TileBase> extends javafx.scene.control.SkinBase<T>
A common skin for implementing tile-based controls, specifically the MessageSkin and the TileSkin.
